title: Brutus: Open-source credential testing tool for offensive security
excerpt: Praetorian released Brutus, a high-performance brute force tool supporting SSH, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, SMB, and 20+ protocols.

title: Praetorian Launches Augustus to Test LLM Security
excerpt: Praetorian released Augustus, an open-source vulnerability scanner designed to secure large language models against adversarial threats.
